summary:
They built a Phil.
They literally built a Phil into the game.
Aside from the tuba playing, Richard was Phil. Phil even admitted...
body:
They built a Phil.

They literally built a Phil into the game.

Aside from the tuba playing, Richard was Phil. Phil even admitted to everything they had in common.

Then Dan admitted that in choosing Bobby for a boyfriend he wasn’t choosing a husband for life; the implication being that if he was, he would’ve chosen differently.

As of we don’t all know who he would’ve picked.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: something i think about a lot regarding phan is that coming out as gay would be an effective way to get even more attention to...
question: something i think about a lot regarding phan is that coming out as gay would be an effective way to get even more attention to their channels/side projects and, of course, help out a few confuse teens. i mean, we've gone through a entire era of famous youtubers coming out and as far as i'm concerned, none of them suffered actual backlash to the point of disappearing from the internet due to negative reaction from viewers. considering all this, why wouldn't dnp come out if they were actually gay?
answer:
For a thousand reasons. Their sexualities and romantic lives have always been off limits to us. Think about it. If they wanted to keep their love lives totally private, then why would they bother coming out? Like, why would they want everyone to know they were gay, if everything else in their lives regarding that topic was never going to be talked about? Like, maybe it’s just me, but I don’t see a real reason for telling everyone what your sexual orientation is, and then keeping every relationship very private. Why would you want one of those things to be public, and the other not?


Plus, I’m sure Dan and Phil would prefer it if their channels and projects gained popularity because they’re good, rather than because they’re gay. And as for helping confused teens, you don’t have to be openly LGBT in order to speak about LGBT issues and be a good ally.


So, that’s what I think. Dan and Phil would rather be seen as entire people, instead of “those gay guys from the internet.” And their love lives have never been something they’re willing to share with us anyway, so it really doesn’t make a lot of sense for them to tell us what their sexualities are.

summary: When they first uploaded that video, I thought it said something like "we are dating" and I short circuited a bit. But I...
question: When they first uploaded that video, I thought it said something like "we are dating" and I short circuited a bit. But I mean...if Dan doesn't want him, can I have Phil? I've been really good this year.
answer:
Oh buddy get in line!! There’s a whole army of Phillies out there and we are not afraid to scratch and bite!

But yeah that title… my brain short circuited for a moment there lol

tags: hope you're doing well lovely anon
summary: Lizzy, what's your fav cliche scenario to read in a fic? What is ur fav to write? Also if you could know dan/phil for any 1 year...
question: Lizzy, what's your fav cliche scenario to read in a fic? What is ur fav to write? Also if you could know dan/phil for any 1 year in his life as a friend which would you chose? Knowing that you guys wd never talk again after wards? Also who do you think wd propose if they do? D or p?  N y?  (love u :p hope ur good n uni is a happier place than before)
answer:
Hello anon ☺️ today has been a really bad day so far so this ask is a really nice distraction!

My favorite cliche scenario to read AND to write is hurt/comfort sick fics haha. Give me head rubs! Give me needy cuddles! Give me concerned partners! I can’t get enough

If I could know d or p for one year of their life I would definitely want to know 2008 Phil! I just need to talk to that strange adorable boy and understand his brilliant mind better! (2008 Phil is truly one of the best things to happen to mankind! Dan would agree with me on that)

About the proposal question… Mmhm… Honestly I’ll be boring and say that I don’t think there will be a proposal haha 😅 I think they would probably just discuss it mutually and come to a decision (but I’m loving the idea of Dan proposing because he’s so romantic and would probably do something cheesy af!)

summary: the phandom survey is far from representative though. you can't generalize millions of people based on a questionnaire that was...
question: the phandom survey is far from representative though. you can't generalize millions of people based on a questionnaire that was filled out by only thousands of them
answer:
You’re right, anon. Surveys and things like that aren’t necessarily representative of an entire group. It’s representative of the people who took the survey.


Like, if you surveyed 500,000 women, and 50% of them said they were lesbians, that doesn’t mean 50% of all the women in the world are lesbians. You’d have to ask every woman in the world in order to get an accurate number on that, and you haven’t even come close. All you know for sure is that out of the 500,000 women you spoke to, 50% of those specific women are lesbians.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Secret Admirer (3) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two

Christmas Candy Grams - auroraphilealis

Summary: Dan gets a candy gram at his workplace from a secret admirer calling him an angel, but Dan has absolutely no idea who it could be.

Don’t you know that you’re amazing? (ao3) - Last_Hope_For_Humanity

Summary: Phil finds secret admire notes in his locker and doesn’t think anything of it. Someone must be fucking with him, right?

Guess Who? - crescendohowell

Summary: Dan begins to find notes complimenting him in his locker and he can’t figure out who it is.

Guess Who? (wattpad) - hollyyspears

Summary: Phil starts to receive secret love messages.
But who is on the other end of the phone?

OTP (ao3) - brookwrites

Summary: Dan and Phil are simply friends, but when Phil gets a secret admirer, things get more complicated. After an oblivious Phil finally realizes that the admirer was really Dan, the entire school somehow manages to as well. Can their relationship (or either of them) hold up under the weight of the fact that they’re suddenly the school’s OTP?

Prestissimo - botanistlester

Summary: When Dan starts to get notes in his locker in the form of terrible pick up lines, he doesn’t know who it could be and he doesn’t really care. All he cares about is his violin and his studies. He could care less about the nonchalant cellist who never seems to take anything seriously.

Secret Admirer (wattpad) - geniusotaku

Summary: Valentine’s Day special.

Secret Admirer (wattpad) - 50shadesofyourmum

Summary: Phil has a secret admirer and has devoted TOO much time trying to figure it out *begins sarcastic tone* who could it possible be?

Sticky Notes (ao3) - burnedoutphan

Summary: Dan keeps getting notes in his locker from a secret admirer…

Valentine’s Day - imasexuallyambiguousnerd

Summary: Dan leaves song lyrics in the form of notes in Phil’s locker on Valentines Day.

You are Loved (ao3) - delianismyotp

Summary: Two boys, unbelievably scared. Phil is a secret admirer of Dan. Dan doesn’t even realize he existed until a love song he wrote was played in class. Now Dan wants answers.

Yours Truly, Dan (wattpad) - howellyoudoing

Summary: 15 year old Dan Howell is new to Brookdale secondary school. He has no friends at this school…  well at least in till he meets  16 year old Phil Lester,  the school heartthrob. Dan is instantly attracted to this mysterious boy but is too shy to tell Phil how he feels. instead he creates a pen name and writes to Phil as a secret admirer. Will Phil find out about Dan being his secret lover?  and if he does will there friendship turn into dust or will it blossom into a heartfelt romance?

Dan is instantly attracted to this mysterious boy but is too shy to tell Phil how he feels. instead he creates a pen name and writes to Phil as a secret admirer. Will Phil find out about Dan being his secret lover?  and if he does will there friendship turn into dust or will it blossom into a heartfelt romance?

trail.content_raw:
part one, part two

Christmas Candy Grams - auroraphilealis

Summary: Dan gets a candy gram at his workplace from a secret admirer calling him an angel, but Dan has absolutely no idea who it could be.

Don’t you know that you’re amazing? (ao3) - Last_Hope_For_Humanity

Summary: Phil finds secret admire notes in his locker and doesn’t think anything of it. Someone must be fucking with him, right?

Guess Who? - crescendohowell

Summary: Dan begins to find notes complimenting him in his locker and he can’t figure out who it is.

Guess Who? (wattpad) - hollyyspears

Summary: Phil starts to receive secret love messages.
But who is on the other end of the phone?

OTP (ao3) - brookwrites

Summary: Dan and Phil are simply friends, but when Phil gets a secret admirer, things get more complicated. After an oblivious Phil finally realizes that the admirer was really Dan, the entire school somehow manages to as well. Can their relationship (or either of them) hold up under the weight of the fact that they’re suddenly the school’s OTP?

Prestissimo - botanistlester

Summary: When Dan starts to get notes in his locker in the form of terrible pick up lines, he doesn’t know who it could be and he doesn’t really care. All he cares about is his violin and his studies. He could care less about the nonchalant cellist who never seems to take anything seriously.

Secret Admirer (wattpad) - geniusotaku

Summary: Valentine’s Day special.

Secret Admirer (wattpad) - 50shadesofyourmum

Summary: Phil has a secret admirer and has devoted TOO much time trying to figure it out *begins sarcastic tone* who could it possible be?

Sticky Notes (ao3) - burnedoutphan

Summary: Dan keeps getting notes in his locker from a secret admirer…

Valentine’s Day - imasexuallyambiguousnerd

Summary: Dan leaves song lyrics in the form of notes in Phil’s locker on Valentines Day.

You are Loved (ao3) - delianismyotp

Summary: Two boys, unbelievably scared. Phil is a secret admirer of Dan. Dan doesn’t even realize he existed until a love song he wrote was played in class. Now Dan wants answers.

Yours Truly, Dan (wattpad) - howellyoudoing

Summary: 15 year old Dan Howell is new to Brookdale secondary school. He has no friends at this school…  well at least in till he meets  16 year old Phil Lester,  the school heartthrob. Dan is instantly attracted to this mysterious boy but is too shy to tell Phil how he feels. instead he creates a pen name and writes to Phil as a secret admirer. Will Phil find out about Dan being his secret lover?  and if he does will there friendship turn into dust or will it blossom into a heartfelt romance?

!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester
